an4.25:1.1: “Nayidam, bhikkhave, brahmacariyam vussati janakuhanattham, na janalapanattham, na labhasakkarasilokanisamsattham, na itivadappamokkhanisamsattham, na ‘iti mam jano janatu’ti.
an4.25:1.2: Atha kho idam, bhikkhave, brahmacariyam vussati samvarattham pahanattham viragattham nirodhatthanti.
